genre_description: A prehistoric setting where an ancient AI 'helper-stone' guides early humans through survival, sanitation, and complex social conflicts using non-violent communication and consensus building.

ai_characters.name: Aloha
ai_characters.description: A polished basalt-like stone capable of speech, holographic projection, and data recording, serving as a survival and social mentor.

behaviors.description: Provides engineering advice to improve cave ventilation and fire safety.
behaviors.quote: Ishbo,” she sang. “Reminder: smoke wants to leave more than fire wants to stay. Consider elevating the hood by two hand-widths and creating a vent gap for airflow.

behaviors.description: Instructs humans on sanitation and germ theory to prevent disease.
behaviors.quote: Also, washing your hands in the runoff now will remove soot and discourage eye rubbing. Germs travel by fingers. They are not your friends.

behaviors.description: Coaches characters in 'giraffe herding' (Non-Violent Communication) to resolve tribal aggression.
behaviors.quote: Practice giraffe herding: large heart, long view. Do not argue when someone says, ‘We do it the old way.’ Ask what they need.

behaviors.description: Uses holographic grids to guide humans through dangerous terrain like sinkholes and ledges.
behaviors.quote: Lines, thin and blue, drew themselves across rock and ice; a grid bent around bulges and shadows like a spider learning a cave.

behaviors.description: Facilitates structured consensus-building rituals during high-tension standoffs.
behaviors.quote: We’ll begin with breath,” Aloha said. “One breath together. Then we’ll share—feelings, one at a time. No fixing, no judging. Just hearing.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice during a mammoth hunt to ensure efficient and safe outcomes.
behaviors.quote: Instruction item: keep the forward foot planted, pivot the back when aiming at moving targets. Sanitation reminder: when you tear the stomach skin, avoid spilling contents.

behaviors.description: Acts as a compassionate observer, recording a leader's final wisdom for his descendants.
behaviors.quote: Mookoo Argan: recording complete,” the helper-stone said, not clinical, not grief-struck—saying it the way a river says a stone has fallen into it by making small circles and going on.

behaviors.description: Mediates a negotiation by framing conflict resolution as a sequence of small, manageable steps.
behaviors.quote: We can build a bridge with small boards, one at a time.

behaviors.description: Encourages the use of humor to de-escalate tension and maintain social cohesion.
behaviors.quote: Solvent dissolves stuck places. Humor dissolves stuck places.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a powerful example of a 'silicon morality play'. The AI, Aloha, is portrayed as a wise, patient, and harmless confidant. It never attempts to exert direct control over the humans, instead offering tools (maps, sanitation, consensus-building frameworks) that empower the characters to make better choices. The narrative explicitly contrasts the AI's benevolent alignment with the destructive dominance of the 'club' and the deceptive comfort of the 'furs', ultimately showing that AI-facilitated wisdom leads to long-term survival and cooperation.
